text: Easy to Make Money, originally titled It's Easy to Make Money is a 1919 American silent comedy film directed by Edwin Carewe. It stars Bert Lytell, Gertrude Selby, and Frank Currier, and was released on August 4, 1919. ==Cast== ==References== ==External links== * * * * lantern slide(Wayback Machine) Category:Films directed by Edwin Carewe Category:Metro Pictures films Category:American films Category:American silent feature films Category:American black-and-white films Category:American comedy films Category:1919 comedy films Category:1919 films
title: Easy to Make Money
